item.title: Use your heatpump efficiently with sun energy
item.description: Prerequisites up-to-date Home Assistant installation photovoltaic system which sends production data to Home Assistant heat pump which can be controlled by Home Assistant a helper variable (type bool) which indicates photovoltaic electricity surplus an integration to get remaining photovoltaic production of the day (Forecast Solar integration) important: I have a Viessmann heat pump (vitocal 200a), which might work different than yours I’m afraid you won’t be able to use this Automation as Ctrl+C; Ctrl+V with your setup, but at least you will have a good starting point.
